abstract: Northern Rock, one of Europe’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold some of its mortgage portfolio to JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: Northern Rock, one of Europe’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold some of its mortgage portfolio to JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Northern Rock, one of Europe’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold some of its mortgage portfolio to JPMorgan Chase on Friday as part of its plan to repay about £25 billion ($49 billion) in emergency funding.

headline.main: Chase Buys Some of Lender’s Assets
headline.print_headline: Chase Buys Some of Lender’s Assets
